meanings.definition: The edible kernel of a nut.
meanings.sent1: I love adding nutmeats to my oatmeal for extra crunch.
meanings.sent2: She sprinkled some chopped nutmeats on top of the salad.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored the nutmeats in its secret stash for winter.
meanings.sent4: The nutmeats of wisdom can be found in the stories of our elders.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly roasted nutmeats filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The inner part of a nut.
meanings.sent1: Cracking open the shell revealed the hidden nutmeats inside.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for finely ground nutmeats to be mixed into the batter.
meanings.sent3: The nutmeats were shy and preferred to stay hidden within the hard shell.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like cracking open a nut to reveal the sweet nutmeats inside.
meanings.sent5: The nutmeats held the essence of the tree's strength and resilience.
